alert.note: Alert for Charlton; Clinch; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 1:32PM EST until January 04 at 2:15PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Nassau County in northeastern Florida... Western Baker County in northeastern Florida... Northern Columbia County in northern Florida... Southeastern Hamilton County in northern Florida... South central Ware County in southeastern Georgia... Southeastern Clinch County in southeastern Georgia... Southeastern Charlton County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 215 PM EST. * At 131 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Fargo to White Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... White Springs, Taylor, Winfield, Suwannee Valley, St. George and Five Points. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for northern and northeastern Florida...until 200 PM EST for southeastern Georgia... and until 400 PM EST for southeastern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
